title: What is the safest free YouTube downloader? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'd recommend Jihosoft 4K Video Downloader - it's easy and safe to use from my experience! Just Use Youtube45 website ! All you gotta do iz add 45 in the URL bar after the word youtube which watching any video !
